context.title: Changelog for Rule: HTML lang and xml:lang match
context.changelog: [{"commit":"e87fa0696963a2a7f950b35712cc93d9afb56dd7","msg":"fix: update links to WCAG21 resources (#776)","date":"1566375576"},{"commit":"1ae0c47454fefde325bb2852c0393c5023f81194","msg":"Correct explanatory text of examples (#660)","date":"1562742294"},{"commit":"59456c3561ae35293c30a7d9120aa1f291a2ae91","msg":"Bugfix closing svg tag (#657)","date":"1562678603"},{"commit":"c9a3f5dd61e126b8632714dfc59718f3ab7666b8","msg":"Glossary and Rule update: Replacing \"non-empty\" definition (#430)","date":"1557910722"},{"commit":"1d7899bd85219c6661aa1600526663a8c922cb9b","msg":"Chore: Adapt site to ACT Rules CR format (#547)","date":"1557402394"},{"commit":"d0848acd83b5841564409f04f5cf4da7072a173c","msg":"Template update - HTML lang and xml:lang match (#511)","date":"1557262588"},{"commit":"a289b7510c398fc4366f3cf9d6bfc0bbb0c5529f","msg":"chore: rename files and update associations (#489)","date":"1556526852"},{"commit":"1ddc581088aa696b0875510158f2c57dd37c458a","msg":"chore: add unique id to all rules (#478)","date":"1555411093"},{"commit":"d38ab7e2d621f93aa213b0a151893bf3c9934ab8","msg":"chore: WCAG ACT RULES CG Website Update (#437)","date":"1555317646"},{"commit":"67612e6946bb33d81830af94e09b7ddba0fa5f50","msg":"chore: Mark all SVG documents and add missing namespaces (#300)","date":"1539172987"},{"commit":"77b75c40f635e8ac612d83e9c4ef4aa883a6ddac","msg":"Fix: testcase generation (#296)","date":"1539074727"},{"commit":"8be66ec17013a88d799c8e512ab352db8af8e94c","msg":"Update name of html-xml-lang-match rule (#279)","date":"1538498262"},{"commit":"4a4c852a07221a050d0ab21337db56c8e28de7b6","msg":"Chore: Update test cases format and descriptions (#230)","date":"1535617752"},{"commit":"8f5b2955b4c4d801c789eefdbf48f0ac93c2305c","msg":"fix: links in background were not anchors (#187)","date":"1531472363"},{"commit":"3ec9ec6493c988f6d59040e3a0d551c7edf1ae4c","msg":"FINAL: SC3-1-1-html-xml-lang-match (#96)","date":"1530002738"}]
context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"5b7ae0","name":"HTML lang and xml:lang match","rule_type":"atomic","description":"The rule checks that for the `html` element, there is no mismatch between the primary language in non-empty `lang` and `xml:lang` attributes, if both are used.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:3.1.1":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_aspects":["DOM Tree"],"authors":["Annika Nietzio","Jey Nandakumar"]}
